title: More Than Love: A YA Historical Fantasy
description: Dive into a world of magic and adventure in the thrilling conclusion to the epic More Than Life young adult fantasy trilogy.Jaspar Marlow, after years of relentless pursuit, has uncovered the long-lost island of Qualaris. But when he unknowingly gives that location to the evil enchanter Janus, he jeopardizes the very existence of the island and its inhabitants. Now, Jaspar must break free from Janus's grasp, navigate treacherous obstacles, and race against time to rescue Qualaris before it succumbs to darkness.Cordelia Kimbal was last seen getting captured by a strange, cerulean man in bronze armor. She wakes up in Qualaris only to realize that the utopia she envisioned is far from reality. Tasked with confronting the inner demons plaguing the island's inhabitants and defending against external threats, Cordelia learns valuable lessons about the dichotomy between dreams and reality. As unexpected perils emerge, including a mysterious illness and unfamiliar creatures, Cordelia must rely on the aid of strangers to ensure her survival.In "More Than Love," familiar faces return alongside compelling new characters, weaving a tapestry of intrigue, suspense, and destiny fulfillment. With unexpected twists and turns at every corner, this gripping tale will keep readers on the edge of their seats until the very end.Don't miss your chance to experience the thrilling conclusion to the More Than Life trilogy. Order your copy of "More Than Love" today and immerse yourself in a world where courage, friendship, and love prevail against all odds.
author: Bethanie Finger
